title: Digimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna
title_japanese: デジモンアドベンチャー LAST EVOLUTION 絆
synopsis: In 2010, more than ten years have passed since the summer when Taichi and Agumon met and explored the digital world. Taichi is now a university student, living alone, working hard at school, and working every day, but with his future still undecided. Meanwhile, Yamato and others continue to work on Digimon incidents and activities that help people with their partner Digimon. When an unprecedented phenomenon occurs, the Chosen Children discover that when they grow up, their relationship with their partner Digimon will come closer to an end. As a countdown timer activates on the Digivice, they realize that the more they fight with their partner Digimon, the faster their bond breaks. Will they fight for others and lose their partner? The time to choose and decide is approaching fast. There is a short time before “chosen children” will become adults. This is the last adventure of Taichi and Agumon. (Source: ANN, edited)
ending_themes: "Hanareteite mo (離れていても)" by AiM
